content.query:
SELECT
    count(1)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://kjastorage.dfs.core.windows.net/test/partitiontest/ORDERS/*/*.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
--WHERE [result].filepath(1) in ('O_ORDERDATE=1992-01-04') -- 623,268
WHERE [result].filepath(1) in ('O_ORDERDATE=1992-01-04','O_ORDERDATE=1992-01-03')
